Example: Adding a new pokemon category¶

This example adds a new category to the wardrobe with 3 pokemon skins.

Make sure you have understood the introduction to this topic.

Goal¶

  • The player should be able to select pokemon specific skins from a new category in gui.

Step by Step¶

As mentioned before a powerful editor like Notepad++ in this example is recommend.

Warning

1. Make a copy of your config.yml! YAML, the configuration language this config.yml is using, takes spaces and tabs very serious, so be careful otherwise the config.yml cannot be parsed when executing the reload command.

  1. Let’s add a new category and name it pokemon-skins.

  2. Also, let’s copy the default navigation items to our new category.

  1. Now add our skins which we have got from minecraft-heads.com.

  1. Now we need to connect our new page to the wardrobe page.

  1. Execute /petblockreload and open the gui to use the new category.

Download config.yml


Note

If the server console now displays an error then the config.yml cannot be parsed. In this case apply your backup you have made and try the steps again being extra carefully.
